title: Taxi fare prices in Egypt?
subtitle: Enter departure and arrival locations and press submit.
asterisk message: *used to calculate time in traffic. Defaults to current time.
searchErrorMessage: Could not find location; try another search term.
routeErrorMessage: Could not find a path connecting origin and destination.
departureTimeErrorMessage: Error in specified time. Departure time cannot be in the past.
locationNotEgypt: location not in Egypt. Results might not be accurate.
